name: Goblin Keeper
description:
This is Goblin Keeper. A civilisation building adventure where you are one of the last goblins in the world with nothing left thanks to the nasty king Clement. Fight for survival and build a goblin empire to last the ages.

This is a Ludum Dare 45 submission to the theme 'start with nothing'

The Sprig dynamite team

-Bram - Max -Masha -Sam

patch 0.1 fixed numerous game breaking issues

-decreased building time -fixed goblin ai -remove night time despawn - day longer, night shorter- stone spawns everywhere- quicker main goblin -fewer enemies
